thread.title: McMaster, Kelly may leave over tensions with Trump: sources

title: McMaster, Kelly may leave over tensions with Trump: sources
text:
McMaster, Kelly may leave over tensions with Trump: sources 10:17am EST - 01:53 
Longstanding friction between U.S. President Donald Trump and two top aides, the National Security Adviser and the Chief of Staff, has grown to a point that either or both might quit soon, four senior administration officials said.   
Longstanding friction between U.S. President Donald Trump and two top aides, the National Security Adviser and the Chief of Staff, has grown to a point that either or both might quit soon, four senior administration officials said.  //reut.rs/2EPqX6L
